Reviews.Title: Vivitar Vivicam
Reviews.Author: Paul E. Gorton
Reviews.Content: Good camera for the price. Camera screen a little hard see details of pictures. Overall an O.K. camera

Reviews.Title: My first digital camera
Reviews.Author: Collis Huntington "Hyawatha"
Reviews.Content: The price of the Vivitar 7022 camera and it's 7.1 spec's is what got me to buy this my first digital camera. I took little over a hundred pictures before I had to change the batteries with my first use. The battery compartment is hard to get into to put batteries in, you have to find a tool to open it, but then you will not have to worry about the batteries falling out either. It is a bit dark when using inside without flash. I have not used video mode much. The video mode seems to require fully charged batteries. It took good enough pictures outside for a first time user own digital camera. I hope some day to be able to afford a digital camera that takes better pictures of the moon than this Vivitar 7022. The moon looked hazy. Over all, I think it is a good first time digital camera.

Reviews.Title: Quality same as price - CHEAP!!
Reviews.Author: Philip M. Rubenzer
Reviews.Content: I bought and exchanged THREE in a row, and never found one with working audio.  It sounded like horsehooves or a loud rumbling, so as a camcorder with sound this product was USELESS!  The picture quality was also worse than older 3 MP cameras I've had.  NOT worth the price!

ProductInfo.Name: Vivitar Vivicam V7022 7.1MP Black HD Digital Camera Plus 4GB Accessory Kit
